WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
 
With the Excel 2007 writer my xlsx Template include an extra sheets for every sheet it already had. I currently have three sheets on my Tempalte but when it is processed and passed to user it has 3 extra sheets. 
 
SheetA, SheetB, SheetC after wrting to the template it has SheetA, SheetA 1, SheetB, SheetB 1, SheetC, SheetC 1
 
Is this a bug or can I use PHP Excel of remove any sheets that end in 1?
 
Rgds
Chris
WorkItem.Summary: Excel 2007 Writer is creating Extra Sheets on my file

Comments.Message:
Hi, 

I also have the same issue.
Any idea how to solve this?
Please provide an example of the template that does this.... it's been reported a few times, but people have never been able to provide me with a file that actually demonstrates the problem.
